name: Zotefoams Evazote Standard Long Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: This 1-centimetre thick foam pad has good resiliency thanks to its high 18 percent EVA content. Evazote® pads are physically blown with pure nitrogen gas for durability. Flexible to –70 degrees Celsius, it’s also abrasion and UV resistant.Dimensions are 190 x 50cm
